entity.name: Ptah - Creator God & Master Craftsman
entity.subtitle: Creator God, Patron of Craftsmen and Architects
entity.description: Ptah is the creator god of Memphis who brought the world into being through thought and speech. Patron of craftsmen, architects, and artisans, depicted as mummified man holding staff. He created through divine utterance, speaking the names of all things to bring them into existence. Husband of Sekhmet, father of Nefertum.
